Articles.Content:
Not sure if this has been suggested, but I think it would be pretty cool if there was debris particles when a decoupler is fired. Like this:

http://gfycat.com/FriendlyClosedCod

I feel as if this would be a mod rather than in stock for some reason. And of course, the particles would be physics-less, just temporary particle effects.

Edited December 1, 2015 by TyrannoFan
Clarification; replace debris with particles

Just a clarification, I believe you are talking about the ice particulate that gets expelled (I think that is what it is anyway).

If you use the term 'debris', people are going to confuse it with something else entirely.

I think this would make a really neat visual enhancement. Non-persistent and no collisions.  I think it would be good in stock as well, we are expecting a visual overhaul SoonTM

Edited December 1, 2015 by Alshain
Yeah, I edited the OP just now from "debris" to "particle effects", I can definitely see some people confusing it with, well, debris.
Might be able to do this with the  CoolRockets! Cryo and Launch Particle FX which look at the thread is all in smokescreen plugin now might have to play around with it and see
Thats a great idea, also what was that rocket in the video?

19 minutes ago, Dfthu said:

Thats a great idea, also what was that rocket in the video?

You can see here http://www.nasa.gov/centers/armstrong/features/rocket_demonstrates_new_capability.html

Right, while we're at it, could we get some better decouple sounds that aren't *KA-DOOSHHhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhh* Breathing into a microphone for engine sounds are bad enough, but with the KA-DOOSH, it's just kinda silly.

4 minutes ago, Sequinox said:

Right, while we're at it, could we get some better decouple sounds that aren't *KA-DOOSHHhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhh* Breathing into a microphone for engine sounds are bad enough, but with the KA-DOOSH, it's just kinda silly.

For sounds you might want to keep a eye on this thread http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/124687-plugin-dynamicsfx-custom-part-sound-effects-v10-alpha/

 

EDIT- Or this one http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/49309-released-arp-mod-audio-replacement-project/

Edited December 2, 2015 by Mecripp2
Those kind of effect are on my list of things to do for SmokeScreen
